ai-mil3.7.14:1.2_0: “Venerable Sir, you can cut off all the finest Vāsabha.”
ai-mil3.7.14:1.5_0: “Great king, the whole teaching is not worth a sixteenth part of all things.
ai-mil3.7.14:1.6_0: Whatever wealth he cuts, all is evident, there is no second decrease.”
ai-mil3.7.14:3.1_0: The subtlety of the ocean is subtle,
